Wave 1 Battle Cards

Heroism

  1. What happens if I have more than one character with Heroism and attack damage would be done to a different character?
    You can choose which of the characters will take the damage.
  2. Does the damage still count as attack damage?
    Yes. Any other card that cares about attack damage will still apply.
  3. Secret Actions say they scrap at the end of my opponent's turn. If I Brainstorm, Secret Action, Peace Through Tyranny, how long does the Secret Action stay out? Will it stay out for my second turn, until it is my opponent's turn, and then scrap at the end of their turn? Or do Secret Actions just scrap at the end of the following turn, so it would scrap at the end of my second turn?
    It will stay out for your second turn and scrap at the end of your opponentâ€™s turn.
